sections_changed: II. PURCHASE PRICE AND PAYMENT TERMS
summary_of_the_change: The purchase price was reduced from $475,000 to $465,000. The earnest money deposit increased from $15,000 to $20,000. The mortgage loan amount was adjusted from $380,000 to $372,000. The period to obtain a loan commitment was extended from 21 days to 28 days (Sec. II).
The inspection period was extended from 10 days to 14 days (Sec. III).
The closing date was extended from April 30, 2024, to May 15, 2024 (Sec. IV).
The clause regarding the Buyer's right to conduct a final walkthrough inspection and the specific time for possession of the property was removed (Sec. V).
